FirstSen: STUDIO98 offers terrace and garden pergolas to help you create your dream space for work, relaxation, and meetings with friends, regardless of the weather.

Lower.t1: Steel pergolas with roofing provide perfect protection from the sun.
Lower.t2: We create pergolas with a rigid steel structure combined with fabric covers.
Lower.t3: Wooden adjustable louver panels made of Siberian larch offer ideal wind protection and ensure privacy.
Lower.t4: We offer more than fifty colors of waterproof fabric to satisfy even the most demanding tastes.
Lower.t5: If you're unsure of the final result, we can prepare a free visualization for you.

contact.form: Click the button below and fill out the application form, which will allow us to estimate your project.
